properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ndiwe kuhani hata milele -
kuhani hata milele.
kwa mfano wake Melkisedeki -
kuhani hata milele.
kuhani - kuhani hata milele. x2
kuhani - kuhani hata milele,
kwa mfano wake Melkisedeki
kuhani - kuhani hata milele.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yesu Kristu ndiye mchungaji
huwalisha kondoo,
wakati wake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Huwatengeneza yatima
pia nao wajane,
kwa wema wake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nitamwimbia Mungu wangu
ametukuka sana,
Bwana wa vita.
